    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(float xCoor,
             float yCoor,
             int size,
             double damage,
             int health,
             float speed,
             int pointVal)
        Creates an enemy with a character reference
        Parameters:
        xCoor - X location of the enemy
        yCoor - Y location of the enemy
        size - The size of one of the sides of the enemy's square
        damage - The damage upon contacting the hostile
        health - The health of the enemy
        speed - The pixels moved each frame
        pointVal - points awarded upon killing the enemy
        charRef - Character that is given as the character reference
